resources.string: This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental.

Please note that this is a beta version of the game which is still undergoing final testing before its official release. The game, its software and all content found on it are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis.
Group 5 LTD. Touch screen to continue...

As they wander around, they see an old man asking for help. The group of friends rushed to help the old man. Little do they know the old man was terribly sick and scratched one of them. What should they do?"
